text: And complete the Hajj and Umrah for the sake of Allah
Then disperse from where the people disperse.
And provide for yourself, for the best provision is piety.
So when you have completed your rituals, remember God as you remember your fathers, or in a stronger remembrance.
Among the people is he who says, 'Our Lord, give us' in this world, but he has no share in the Hereafter.
And among them are those who say, 'Our Lord, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the torment of the Fire.'
Then disperse from where the people disperse, and ask forgiveness of God. Indeed, God is Forgiving, Merciful.
And proclaim the Hajj among the people. They will come to you on foot and on every lean shoulder, and they will come from every deep valley.
That they may witness benefits for themselves and mention the name of God in appointed days for what He has provided for them of livestock. So eat of them and feed the cattle Despair the poor
Then let them put an end to their wickedness, fulfill their vows, and circumambulate the Ancient House
